headline: Show HN: Bookable Schedule – Schedule meetings directly inside ONE email
description:
Hi Hacker News!

We released a new meeting scheduling product today! You can use Bookable Schedule in Boomerang for Gmail or our iOS app to create a set of availabilities and share it as many times as you’d like inside your email. Recipients receive an image of your live availabilities and through the use of image maps, they can see and pick the right appointment slots directly inside whichever email client they’re using.

If the recipient also has Boomerang, they can overlay their calendar on top of the schedule (still inside the email) to see which times work best for them! It works great for things like office hours, client appointments, sales calls, and more. It also doesn't shift the work of scheduling meetings to the person you're inviting, so it's better etiquette[1] and easier for recipients as well as the scheduler.

Please feel free to take a look and play with it, we’d love to hear your thoughts!

[1] https://twitter.com/JCornebise/status/1486809751602319371

(By the way, we are hiring for frontend and fullstack devs - i.want.to.work at baydin . com)
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 可预约的时间表 - 直接在一个电子邮件中安排会议
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 可預約的時間表 - 直接在一個電子郵件中安排會議
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，Hacker News！

我们今天发布了一个新的会议日程安排产品。你可以使用Boomerang for Gmail或我们的iOS应用中的Bookable Schedule来创建一组空闲时间，并在你的电子邮件中随意分享。收件人会收到你的实时可用性的图像，通过使用图像地图，他们可以直接在他们使用的任何电子邮件客户端中看到并选择正确的预约时段。

如果收件人也有Boomerang，他们可以在日程表上叠加他们的日历（仍然在电子邮件中），以查看哪些时间对他们来说是最好的！这对于像办公时间这样的事情非常有用。这对诸如办公时间、客户约会、销售电话等事情非常有效。它也不会把安排会议的工作转移到你邀请的人身上，所以它是更好的礼仪[1]，对收件人和安排者来说也更容易。

请随时看看和玩玩它，我们很想听听你的想法！

[1] https://twitter.com/JCornebise/status/1486809751602319371

（顺便说一下，我们正在招聘前端和全栈开发人员 - 我想在 baydin .com工作）。
